Playback of all topics from a logged file now works from the command line in  016b4cd , but it's awful code. It doesn't yet use the raw publishers in pull request #251 so it can't publish custom messages.

```
# publish some topics, modifying the ignition transport examples is a good way to get a publisher
ign log record -v 4 --file test.tlog
```

Then 

```
# Playback the recorded log
ign log playback -v 4 --file test.tlog
```

Stuff to do

* Log needs to check the schema version (see [how to do that here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/pull-requests/246/record-proof-of-concept-do-not-merge/diff#Ltools/record/src/playback.cppT88))
* Log needs an api to get topics (see [how to do that here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/pull-requests/246/record-proof-of-concept-do-not-merge/diff#Ltools/record/src/playback.cppT113))
* Playback needs to create all publishers at the start (see [how to do that here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/pull-requests/246/record-proof-of-concept-do-not-merge/diff#Ltools/record/src/playback.cppT178))
* `MsgIter` has a lot of todo's to make it implement `input iterator`
* Playback class needs tests
* Plus all the stuff in the pull request description

@mxgrey FYI
